title: Fitness Legend David Kimmerle Joins ForeverGreen Worldwide Corporation as Spokesman
text:
ForeverGreen Worldwide Corporation
LINDON, Utah , October 13,
ForeverGreen Worldwide Corporation (OTCBB: FVRG), a leading direct marketing company and provider of health-centered products, today announced David Kimmerle , Actor, Host, Athlete and Fitness model, is an official ForeverGreen and Ketopia spokesman and sponsored athlete.
Kimmerle is a five time Muscle and Fitness Cover Model, one of only two people to accomplish this. He has graced more than sixty magazine and book covers. Some of his competition wins include NPC first place & Overall Utah Men's Physique, NPC first place Sacramento Men's Physique, NPC first place & Overall California and Men's Physique, and NPC first place Irongames Men's Physique. Kimmerle has also placed second at the WBFF Worlds Fitness Model, place fifth at WBFF Worlds Fitness Model LA Fitness Expo, and earned first place and overall at the Model & Fitness competition.
" David Kimmerle recognizes how proper nutrition can help bolster the body and the mind for peak performance. We are proud to bring a fitness athlete with such a high level of recognition as Kimmerle to ForeverGreen as a sponsored athlete. He is a prime example of the importance of a healthy and ketogenic lifestyle in the sports world. David's message is one of transformation and inspiration. He is bringing Ketopia and ForeverGreen to his world of fitness and we will expand our presence there as well as in other sports areas and with additional athletes," remarked Michelle LeSueur , Director of Product Development and Education of ForeverGreen.
For more information on David Kimmerle , visit http://www.davidkimmerle.com/ .
For more information on ForeverGreen's products, visit http://www.forevergreen.org .
ForeverGreen Worldwide Corporation develops, manufactures and distributes an expansive line of all natural whole foods and products to North America , Australia , Europe , Asia , Africa and South America , including their new global offerings, PowerStrips, SolarStrips and BeautyStrips. They also offer their new North America weight-management line Ketopia, along with Azul and FrequenSea, whole-food beverages with industry exclusive marine phytoplankton, a line of hemp-based whole-food products, immune support and weight management products, Pulse-8 powdered L-arginine formula, 24Karat Chocolate.
